name: mpa-enhancer
description: Minimalist JavaScript to make your MPA work that much better

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run make-dirs && npm run static && esbuild --format=esm --watch --outdir=docs/todo --bundle --servedir=docs/todo ./src-todo/sw.ts
scripts.static: cd ./src-todo/ && cp --parents `find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.html' -o -name '*.css'` ../docs/todo && cd .. && npm run mpa  && npm run todo && npm run app
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run make-dirs && npm run static && esbuild --format=esm --outdir=docs/todo --bundle ./src-todo/sw.ts
